title: Pothole Repair SLA
text: According to the Municipal Corporation Act, potholes reported on major roads must be filled within 48 hours of reporting. For internal roads, the timeline is 7 days. Failure to comply may result in action against the responsible contractor.

title: Garbage Collection Rules
text: Solid Waste Management Rules 2016 mandate segregation of wet and dry waste at source. The local body is responsible for daily door-to-door collection. Burning of garbage is strictly prohibited and punishable with a fine.

title: Noise Pollution Limits
text: The Noise Pollution (Regulation and Control) Rules 2000 specify ambient air quality standards in respect of noise. In residential areas, the limit is 55 dB(A) during the day (6 AM - 10 PM) and 45 dB(A) at night (10 PM - 6 AM).

title: Streetlight Maintenance
text: All non-functional streetlights must be repaired within 24 hours of complaint registration. If a pole is damaged, it must be replaced within 3 working days.

title: Water Supply Contamination
text: In case of contaminated water supply complaints, the water department must collect samples within 4 hours and provide an alternative water source (tanker) within 6 hours.
